Name: 		Filthy Kitchen

Submitted By: 	dustmop

Category:	Action platformer

Description:  	The kitchen is filthy, clean it up!

Controls:	D-pad: Movement
		B: Throw your swatter
		A: Jump

Rom info:	Mapper 28
		Filesize 64k 

Credits:	Dustmop - Developer
                Shiru - Famitone
		Knife City - music
